Alignment Cant Attributes
=========================



```
concept {
    IfcAlignmentCant:Segments -> IfcAlignmentCantSegment
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartDistAlong -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:HorizontalLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartCantLeft -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:EndCantLeft -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:StartCantRight -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:EndCantRight -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:SmoothingLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentCantSegment:PredefinedType -> IfcAlignmentCantSegmentTypeEnum
}
```
